<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/dict-hub/entry"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new transactional account key link.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixDICTCreateRequest","description":"Request to use to create a new DICT entry.","required":["reason","branch","accountNumber","accountType","taxId","name","openingDate","requestId"],"type":"object","properties":{"accountNumber":{"description":"Account number, including check digit. If the check digit is a letter, replace it with 0.","pattern":"^[0-9]{1,20}$","type":"string"},"accountType":{"description":"Account type, as domain dictionary for SPI message pacs.008.","enum":["CACC","SLRY","SVGS","TRAN"],"type":"string"},"branch":{"description":"Agency, without check digit.","pattern":"^[0-9]{1,4}$","type":"string"},"key":{"description":"Addressing key. Must be a CPF, CNPJ, E-mail, phone or EVP.\n\n\nCPF: ^[0-9]{11}$\n\nCNPJ: ^[0-9]{14}$\n\nE-mail: Valid W3C HTML5 e-mail address\n\nPhone: ^\\+[1-9][0-9]\\d{1,14}$\n\nEVP: [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}\n\n\\\nNote:\n\nTo create an EVP type key, do not send the Key field.","maxLength":77,"type":"string"},"name":{"description":"The account owner full name.\n\nRegex name for a NATURAL_PERSON: ^([A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿ' -]+)$\n\nRegex name for a LEGAL_PERSON: ^([A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿ,.@:&*+_<>()!?/\\\\$%\\d' -]+)$","maxLength":120,"type":"string"},"openingDate":{"format":"date-time","description":"The account opening date. Must be a valid Date.","type":"string"},"reason":{"description":"The reason.","enum":["USER_REQUESTED","RECONCILIATION"],"type":"string"},"requestId":{"description":"The id of request operation. Must be a Guid with hyphens.","type":"string"},"taxId":{"description":"The account owner tax id. Must be a valid CPF or CNPJ.","type":"string"},"tradeName":{"description":"The account owner trade name.","maxLength":100,"pattern":"^([A-Za-zÀ-ÖØ-öø-ÿ,.@:&*+_<>()!?/\\\\$%\\d' -]+)$","type":"string"},"merchantCustomerId":{"description":"The unique id that identify the merchant customer","type":"string"}},"example":{"accountNumber":"5543","accountType":"CACC","branch":"10","key":"email@gmail.com","name":"JOAO SILVA A","openingDate":"2020-08-13T13:49:03Z","reason":"USER_REQUESTED","requestId":"25824979-1006-49d7-b778-e3d3c663605f","taxId":"11122233304","merchantCustomerId":"28449ee1-0466-477b-95ce-0abc90c9f8cc"}},"examples":{"CreatePixDictNaturalPerson":{"value":{"key":"email@gmail.com","reason":"USER_REQUESTED","branch":"10","accountNumber":"5543","accountType":"CACC","taxId":"11122233304","name":"JOAO SILVA A","openingDate":"2020-08-13T13:49:03Z","requestId":"25824979-1006-49d7-b778-e3d3c663605f","merchantCustomerId":"28449ee1-0466-477b-95ce-0abc90c9f8cc"}},"CreatePixDictLegalPerson":{"value":{"reason":"USER_REQUESTED","key":"66486782000129","branch":"0011","accountNumber":"98765432","accountType":1,"taxId":"66486782000129","name":"NOVA GERECAO USADOS SA","tradeName":"GERACAO USADOS","openingDate":"2020-10-08T00:00:00Z","requestId":"c9d0fc25-8c03-46c6-96d7-c68b0ea1bee8","merchantCustomerId":"28449ee1-0466-477b-95ce-0abc90c9f8cc"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
